about_the_game:
The Supporter Pack DLC contains:
- 2 armour sets for Pseudo, which pay tribute to Metamoq, the hero's mentor in the Zeno Clash games
- 3 customization items for The Boy
- The artifact Humiliation, which forces the loser of the Ritual to wear unique headgear and endure comments on what a unique smell it also exudes.
detailed_description:
The Supporter Pack DLC contains:
- 2 armour sets for Pseudo, which pay tribute to Metamoq, the hero's mentor in the Zeno Clash games
- 3 customization items for The Boy
- The artifact Humiliation, which forces the loser of the Ritual to wear unique headgear and endure comments on what a unique smell it also exudes.

name: Clash - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 4130 (2.9 GHz) / AMD FX 8120 (3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) / AMD Radeon R7 260X (2 GB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6402P (2.8 GHz) / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X (3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 (6 GB) / AMD RX 5600XT (6 GB)

short_description: The Supporter Pack contains 2 armour sets that pay tribute to a Zeno Clash character, 3 customization items for The Boy, and an exclusive artifact for the Ritual.
